mods.name: Larger Stack Sizes
mods.author: Donovan
mods.description: Increases the stack size of wood and stone, including the craftable resource stacks

mods.name: Faster Kill Cam
mods.author: Donovan
mods.description: Halfs the critical kill cam time [Solo players only]
mods.long_description: Halfs the critical kill cam time. *WARNING* This mod is not compatible with multiplayer, and may cause desyncs!
